full_text:
Re: Epstein
From
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
To
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
Date
2019/08/27 08:46
Subject:
Re: Epstein
Attachments:
TEXT.htm
Hi
(b)(6)
(b)(7)(A)(C)
Just a heads-up that Judge Berman invited the Warden and I to the hearing this morning. The Warden declined because of another meeting and asked to meet the Judge at a later date, but I'll be attending. I asked
(b)(6)
if Judge Berman's expectation was for me to sit at counsel's table or in the galley, but she never responded. In that case, I defer to you unless we hear otherwise when we get there.
Thanks,
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
Staff Attorney
CLC New York
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, NY 10007
p: 646-836-(b)(6)
f. 646-836-7665
>>> (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (USANYS)" (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov> 7/30/2019 7:11 PM >>>
Hi (b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
(b)(5)
Thanks,
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
Assistant United States Attorney
Southern District of New York
1 St. Andrew's Plaza
New York, NY 10007
212-637-(b)(6)
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov
Page 3919
DOJ-OGR-00023869
